messages.title: Economic Stability and Jobs
messages.content: My greatest goal in politics is a strong economy. For 4 years I served at the highest levels of Government and oversaw the lowest rates of borrowing for over 300 years, delivering 1000s of jobs locally and securing access to the single market for 3 million people.

messages.title: Representing Our Community
messages.content: I want every constituent to know I am on their side. I have worked tirelessly for low tax, quality education and strong NHS services. My goal is to become a successful Brexit negotiator and defend Barnet from Jeremy Corbyn’s reckless economic agenda.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deliver jobs and stable economy with low borrowing rates, access to single market.
Commitment to low tax, quality education and strong NHS services.
Ensure smooth transition and access to EU markets.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
issues.economy: Build a strong economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs.
issues.education: Strengthen local schools and provide good quality education for every child.
issues.health: Provide proper funding and support for all, ensuring everyone will pay for a strong NHS.
issues.labourEmployment: Build a strong economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs.

community.content: I want every constituent to know I am on their side. I have worked tirelessly for low tax, quality education and strong NHS services.
